description: Homes can be built or renovated to minimize the environmental health risks and the waste of natural resources. The course will consist of lectures, student research projects and community service. The lectures will cover a range of topics including environmental health risks, healthy home environments, conservation, recycling, green construction, urban housing, and geology of West Philadelphia. For their community service, the Penn students will work with the Habitat for Humanity on their local projects building and renovating houses.
name: ENV IMPACT:URBAN HOUSING
